title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid email and password and receives a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid email and password
Click the login button
Verify that login is successful and a JWT token is returned

title: Login fails with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login attempt with invalid credentials is rejected with an appropriate error message and no token is issued.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid email or password
Click the login button
Verify that login fails with an error message and no JWT token is returned

title: Role-based access control enforcement for Growth user
description: Verify that Growth users have access only to permitted actions such as creating tickets, reopening, closing, and viewing own tickets, and are blocked from unauthorized operations.

steps.description: Log in as Growth user
Attempt to create a new ticket
Ticket creation is successful
Attempt to reopen an existing processed ticket created by self
Reopen ticket action succeeds
Attempt to add resolution or assign tickets
Access denied with appropriate error message

title: Role-based access control enforcement for Ops user
description: Verify that Ops users can view all tickets, add resolutions, assign tickets, and update priority, and cannot create or close tickets.

steps.description: Log in as Ops user
View list of all tickets
All tickets are visible regardless of creator
Add resolution remarks to an open ticket
Ticket status changes to 'processed' and user assigned successfully
Attempt to create a new ticket
Access denied with appropriate error
Attempt to close a ticket
Access denied with appropriate error

title: Ticket creation with valid mandatory fields by Growth user
description: Verify that a Growth user can create a ticket providing all required fields and the ticket number is generated in format GROW-YYYYMMDD-NNNN with status 'open'.

steps.description: Log in as Growth user
Navigate to new ticket creation page
Fill in brand name, description, issue type, and priority
Submit the ticket form
Verify ticket is created with status 'open' and ticket_number matches 'GROW-YYYYMMDD-NNNN' format
Activity timeline entry is created for ticket creation
User is redirected to ticket detail page

title: Ticket creation rejects invalid or missing fields
description: Verify that ticket creation form enforces input validation and prevents submission with missing or invalid brand name, description, issue type, or priority.

steps.description: Log in as Growth user
Navigate to new ticket creation page
Attempt to submit form with missing brand name
Form validation error shown for brand name
Attempt to submit form with invalid issue type not in allowed set
Form validation error shown for issue type
Attempt to submit form with invalid priority
Form validation error shown for priority

title: Ticket status lifecycle transitions
description: Verify correct status transitions: open → processed (after Ops resolution) → resolved (after Growth acceptance) or re-opened (after Growth reopens).

steps.description: Create a new ticket as Growth user (status should be 'open')
Log in as Ops user and submit resolution for the open ticket
Ticket status updates to 'processed' and Ops user assigned
Log in as Growth user and accept and close the processed ticket
Ticket status updates to 'resolved' and resolution timestamp recorded
Reopen the resolved ticket (simulate reopen workflow to test reopening)
Ticket status changes to 're-opened' and activity logged

title: Ticket list search and filtering with pagination
description: Verify users can search tickets by ticket number, status, priority, brand name, creator, assignee, and date range, simultaneously applying multiple filters and pagination works correctly.

steps.description: Log in as any user
Navigate to ticket list page
Apply search keyword in full-text search field
Select multiple filters: status 'open', priority 'urgent', brand name filter, creator and assignee filters
Set a date range filter
Ticket list updates showing tickets meeting all filter criteria
Navigate through pagination controls
Correct tickets are listed per page and sorting by priority then date is maintained

title: Activity timeline accuracy and completeness
description: Verify the ticket activity timeline accurately logs and displays all actions (creation, status changes, comments, resolution, reopening) with correct actor details and timestamps in chronological order.

steps.description: Create a new escalation ticket
Perform ticket resolving as Ops user
Reopen the ticket as Growth user
Close the ticket as Growth user
Load the ticket detail page and activity timeline
Verify all actions are logged with correct actor, action type, comments, and timestamps in chronological order

title: Form inline validation and error messaging
description: Verify that all UI forms enforce inline validation on input fields, prevent submission of invalid data, and display appropriate success or error messages.

steps.description: Open the ticket creation form
Leave required fields empty and attempt to submit
Validation messages appear inline for each missing required field
Fill invalid data in fields (e.g. overly long description, invalid priority)
Field-specific error messages displayed preventing submission
Correct errors and submit form
Form submission succeeds and shows confirmation or redirects accordingly

title: UI responsiveness and accessibility on different device sizes
description: Verify that the UI renders and functions correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices including responsive layout, accessible navigation, and visible status/priority indicators.

steps.description: Access the portal on desktop screen size
Verify layout is optimized for desktop; navigation is visible; forms and tables align correctly
Resize browser or emulate tablet screen size
UI adjusts properly, navigation collapses or rearranges as designed; all elements remain accessible
Emulate mobile screen size
Layout is vertically stacked and readable; filtering and forms remain usable; status and priority indicators are clear
Validate accessibility using screen readers and keyboard navigation
All interactive elements are reachable via keyboard and labeled appropriately

title: Security: Input validation and prevention of SQL injection and XSS
description: Verify backend rejects malicious inputs preventing SQL injection and XSS attacks by using parameterized queries and proper input validation.

steps.description: Submit ticket creation or update requests containing SQL injection payloads such as "'; DROP TABLE users;--" in text fields
Backend rejects input with validation error and no database compromise occurs
Submit ticket comments or descriptions containing XSS script tags
Scripts are sanitized or rejected, and no script execution occurs on UI

title: Security: JWT token expiration and invalid token rejection
description: Verify that expired or tampered JWT tokens are rejected by the backend API and user is prompted to re-authenticate.

steps.description: Log in and obtain a valid JWT token
Manipulate token expiry time to past or alter token payload
Call any authenticated API endpoint with expired or invalid token
Backend returns unauthorized error and frontend forces login

title: Rate limiting enforcement to prevent brute force attacks
description: Verify that the API enforces rate limiting on login and other critical endpoints to prevent brute force attacks and excessive requests.

steps.description: Send multiple rapid login attempts with invalid credentials exceeding rate limit threshold
Further requests are blocked with rate limit error message
Send multiple requests to the ticket creation endpoint quickly to test rate limiting
Rate limiting is enforced and requests beyond threshold are blocked

title: UI error messaging and loading states
description: Verify that UI shows appropriate loading spinners during async operations and displays user-friendly error messages on failures (e.g., network errors, server errors).

steps.description: Navigate to tickets list and simulate slow network
Loading spinner or skeleton displays while data is being fetched
Simulate API error when submitting ticket creation form
User sees a clear error message explaining failure
